Articles.Content:
Happy New Year, all!  

What was your favorite science or tech development of 2016?

What are your plans for 2017?

I am going to see if I can run on the treadmill in my current state.  This could be valuable data for a middle-aged man, but it also could be an example of bad decision making.  I can compare this data to the rates at which I stumble and fall in non-post-party scenarios to see the effect of Mew Year's Eve activities on my locomotion under 1g in typical hotel gymnasiums.  Anyway, that's MY first experiment of 2017.
